snippet: In naming Msgr. Battista Mario Salvatore Ricca as interim prelate of the bank, Pope Francis sent a message that he intended to keep a close watch on its dealings.
abstract: Pope Francis approves nomination of Msgr Battista Mario Salvatore Ricca as interim prelate of troubled Vatican Bank.
lead_paragraph: In naming Msgr. Battista Mario Salvatore Ricca as interim prelate of the bank, Pope Francis sent a message that he intended to keep a close watch on its dealings.

headline.main: Pope Fills Key Job at Troubled Vatican Bank
headline.print_headline: Pope Fills Key Job at Troubled Vatican Bank
